verbose_text: In the present study, inhibition of HSP 70 gene expression with TL significantly abolished GA mediated striatal survival against 3NP induced cell death, suggesting that HSP 70 may be a major mediator for the suppression of JNK / c-Jun activation in striatal cells.
evidence: HSP 70 gene expression with TL significantly abolished GA-mediated striatal survival against 3NP-induced cell death
